text: Arau mada'iyanabasi sakalara ocarata sihamtara bhatr churaa'ibaka (praerana karaichilo). Te'om kaichila, ‘he mora sampradaya! Tomaloke kerala allahara ibadata karaa. Te'omra bahirae tomalokara ana kono satya ilaha na'i. Tomalokara pratipalakara taraphara paraa tomalokara ocarata spasta pramana ahi pa'iche. Gatike tomaloke jokha-mapata ojana paraipurna pradana karaiba, manuhaka sihamtara praapya bastu kama nidiba, arau prthiraita santi sthapanara pichata biparyaya srsti nakaraiba, e'itorae'i tomalokara babe kalyanakara yadi tomaloke mumina horaa’
